text: Aduga Moses amadi Elijah-na Jisuga khainaramdai matam aduda Peter-na Ibungoda hairak-i, “Oja Ibungo, eikhoina mapham asida leijabasi eikhoigidamak kayada phakhraba! Eikhoina sang ahum, Ibungogi ama, Moses-gi ama, amasung Elijah-gi ama sasi.” (Mahakna haijariba adu kari hairibano haiba Peter-na khangjaramde.)
